Title: Relates to expenditures supported by monies retained in a municipal contingency and tax stabilization reserve fund
Summary: Excludes certain expenditures supported by monies retained in a municipal contingency and tax stabilization reserve fund from the budget when determining whether the budget is balanced in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles set forth in the state comptroller's uniform system of accounts for municipalities.
LawCode: Amd ยง6-e, Gen Muni L; amd ยง8, Chap 868 of 1975
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the New York state financial emergency act for the city of New York, in relation to expenditures supported by monies retained in a municipal contingency and tax stabilization reserve fund
